messages.subject: other kinds of poison
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to sympathize with you Kerri. I m a certified health nut....while my family is varying shades of grey on this issue. The way I deal with some of
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to sympathize with you Kerri.
I'm a certified health nut....while my family is varying shades of
grey on this issue.

The way I deal with some of my heebie jeebies over hydrogenated
oils, sugar/dye/preservative laden foods is to buy the healthy
alternatives that my kids like. It makes me feel better, although
I'm not sure how much nutritional value there is when they also eat
Krispy Kreme donuts and the like!!!

I truly believe that happiness and joy have far greater effects on
health than any other single factor (other than genetics maybe).
*I* feel much more energized, balanced and soullful when eating
organic, vegetarian food. I also realize it's MY choice, not
everyone elses.
Not much to say here...other than, I understand.:)

Ren
